text: Ate jisa ne apane mata pita nu kiha ki maim tuhade tom vukhi ham. Ki tusim mainu iha dara dila'unde ho ki maim kabara vicom kadhi'a javanga. Halanki mere tom pahilam bahuta sari'am kaumam guzara cuki'am hana. Ate uha dove alaha kaula phari'ada karade hana ki tera nasa hove, tu imana li'a, besaka alaha da va'ada saca hai. Isa la'i uha akhada ki iha sabha ho cuki'am di'am kahani'am hana
